Thank you for joining us in Avente Welfare Day 2020! Congratulations, you have qualified for our F45 Giveaway! Stay tuned to our Instagram for our 2 Lucky Winners!

Additionally, use <AVENTE5> when you download the YouTrip App, and stand a chance to win 3 x $25 in-app Credit, as well as 10 exclusive Tote Bags up for grabs!

We hope you have learnt more about Avente, as well as the world of Management Consulting around us. We will be contacting the first 250 students who are eligible for the Welfare Goodies, so do look out for our emails! We hope to see you soon, our aspiring consultants! Till then, stay safe!
